SELECT t1.id, t1.block_name, t1.create_time, t1.update_time, t2.big_type_name, t3.small_type_name FROM block_info AS t1, block_big_type AS t2, block_small_type AS t3 WHERE t1.big_type_id = t2.id AND t1.small_type_id = t3.id
AND t1.block_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{blockInfoDto.blockName},'%')
AND t1.del_flag = 0 ORDER BY t1.create_time
